short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple time tracking Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of your work with this simple and powerful tool! Automatically capture screenshots, track mouse and keyboard activity, and get real-time performance insights to stay productive.

Pick your project from a dropdown menu, add a quick description of your tasks, and let the extension do the rest. Whether you're a manager leading a team, a freelancer handling multiple clients, or just looking to work better, this tool helps you stay organized and efficient.

Work smarter, stay focused, and get more done effortlessly!
